tool_description: As the only API powered by the PrinceXML HTML-to-PDF engine, DocRaptor provides powerful support for headers, page breaks, page numbers, flexbox, watermarks, accessible PDFs, and much more.
name: DocRaptor HTML-to-PDF
title: DocRaptor HTML-to-PDF

api_list.name: Create Document
api_list.description: Send DocRaptor a URL or HTML content and we'll send back a PDF! Simple as that.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://docraptor-html-to-pdf.p.rapidapi.com/docs"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "docraptor-html-to-pdf.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://docraptor-html-to-pdf.p.rapidapi.com/docs"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "docraptor-html-to-pdf.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
